name: unbutton
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to unfasten the buttons on something such as a shirt: He unbuttoned his jacket and sat back comfortably in his chair. His shirt was unbuttoned to show off a gold medallion.
More examplesFewer examplesHe took off his tie and unbuttoned his collar.I unbuttoned all the buttons on my cardigan.Her coat was unbuttoned, even though it was cold.He wears Italian designer shirts, unbuttoned to the navel.
